__e: Not as long as those who remain are loyal to him.
David, everyone up here is family, loyal to you to a fault.
But I expect loyalty from my staff, so I must show them the same regard until such a time as it is clear that they no longer deserve it.
The point is Bill and I are very loyal to you, especially after everything we put you through in St. Louis.
Let my men see me alive and you shall see where their loyalties lie
That way I get guys with no ties to anybody over there, they belong only to me, 110 percent.
I was taken in by those loyal to the cause, who raised me with a twin mission... teach me to harness the power of who I was and yet to keep it hidden from the world.
He says your guys are incredibly loyal toward you.
Northern families are loyal. They'll fight for you if you ask.
